## Part 2 - API Testing

### OR

[Postman Link](https://www.postman.com/tfernandezbernis-6081900/workspace/tomas-s-workspace/collection/47432599-64e2fead-38cd-467d-b8ed-b46bddfcc7f4?action=share&creator=47432599&active-environment=47432599-035a15cc-2548-4a6b-b051-d298787a7d31)

### OR

1. Copy the contents of the file /OppiziTechnicalTest/Part2/Tomas Fernandez Bernis - Oppizi Tech Test.postman_collection.json
2. Go to Workspace -> Select Import -> Paste the contents
3. Copy the contents of the file /OppiziTechnicalTest/Part2/OpenChargeMap.postman_environment.json
4. Go to Workspace -> Import -> Paste the contents
5. Select the OpenChargeMap environment
6. Run the requests GetPOI and GetReferenceData
